UNTDID7085Type.title: Cargo type classification code
UNTDID7085Type.description:
Code specifying the classification of a type of cargo.

Applicable codes:
* '1' - Documents
* '2' - Low value non-dutiable consignments
* '3' - Low value dutiable consignments
* '4' - High value consignments
* '5' - Other non-containerized
* '6' - Vehicles
* '7' - Roll-on roll-off
* '8' - Palletized
* '9' - Containerized
* '10' - Breakbulk
* '11' - Hazardous cargo
* '12' - General cargo
* '13' - Liquid cargo
* '14' - Temperature controlled cargo
* '15' - Environmental pollutant cargo
* '16' - Not-hazardous cargo
* '17' - Diplomatic
* '18' - Military
* '19' - Obnoxious
* '20' - Out of gauge
* '21' - Household goods and personal effects
* '22' - Frozen cargo
* '23' - Ballast only
* '24' - Incompatible cargo
* '25' - Deep-frozen cargo
